mapper.select: SELECT A.ALARM_ID, CR.ROOM_NAME, CR.ROOM_ID, A.CONTENTS, TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY"-"MM"-"DD' ) as printDate FROM ALARM A JOIN CHAT_ROOM CR ON CR.ROOM_ID = A.ROOM_ID where alarm_id = #{alarm_id}

SELECT A.ALARM_ID, CR.ROOM_NAME, CR.ROOM_ID, A.CONTENTS, TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY"-"MM"-"DD' ) as printDate FROM ALARM A JOIN CHAT_ROOM CR ON CR.ROOM_ID = A.ROOM_ID WHERE A.ALARM_CODE = 'A01' AND A.DELETE_YN='N' AND A.RECEIVER = #{nickName} AND (A.ROOM_ID, A.ALARM_ID) IN ( SELECT ROOM_ID, MAX(ALARM_ID) AS MAX_ALARM_ID FROM ALARM WHERE ALARM_CODE = 'A01' AND RECEIVER = #{nickName} GROUP BY ROOM_ID )
SELECT A.ALARM_ID, A.CONTENTS, A.sender, TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY"-"MM"-"DD' ) as printDate FROM ALARM A WHERE A.ALARM_CODE != 'A01' AND A.DELETE_YN='N' AND A.RECEIVER = #{nickName}
mapper.update: update alarm set read_yn = 'Y' where ALARM_CODE='A01' and RECEIVER = #{nickName}
